A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lot of people hating on the movie because they didn't agree with a couple decisions from the story.  I binge-watched Episodes 1\,2\,3\, and 7 prior to seeing the Last Jedi in theater.  None of the arguments that I have seen (aside from some pacing issues) seem to stem from the movie itself\, but rather the expectations that people had for the story or people who didn't understand the structure of the movie.  This isn't to say that they 'should have enjoyed' the movie\, when obviously they didn't\, as their opinions are as valid as my own.  Just pointing it out as it seems to me that they felt very\, very strongly about only a couple of things within the movie\, and so a less die-hard fan (of I don't even know which Star Wars movies they would be die-hard fans of since their takeaway was so different than my own) is much more likely to enjoy the movie.
